loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a new toilet.

loans.name: Melony

texts.en:
Melony is a 38-year-old woman with three children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Melony has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 8,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy a variety of fish to sell. She has been in this business for 3 years.

In the future, Melony would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy a variety of fish to sell.

loans.name: Berienda

texts.en:
Berienda is a 58-year-old married woman with nine children, one of whom is still in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Berienda has a rice retailing business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more sacks of rice to sell. She has been in this business for 15 years.

She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Salamat

texts.ru: Саламат, 52 года, замужем, дети взрослые и самостоятельные. Саламат занимается выпечкой и торговлей хлебом, лепешками на рынке. У нее в обороте есть мука на сумму 6,000 сом (KGS). Ежемесячная прибыль около 15,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Саламат решила обратиться в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) на покупку муки для выпечки хлеба. Свои доходы Саламат планирует вкладывать в дальнейшее развитие бизнеса.
texts.en:
Salamat is 52 years old and married. Her children are grown and independent. Salamat makes and sells bread and flatbread at the market. She has flour worth 6,000 som (KGS) in stock. Her monthly profit is around 15,000 som (KGS).

In order to further develop her business, Salamat has decided to apply to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 60,000 som (KGS) to buy flour to bake bread. Salamat plans to use her income to continue developing her business.

loans.use: to buy flour to make and sell traditional flatbreads.

loans.name: Gulnara

texts.ru: Гульнара, 51 год, замужем, мать 2 сыновей. У нее высшее образование, работает в детском саду, в качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи она уже 15 лет занимается животноводством. Благодаря упорству, целеустремленности и трудолюбию Гульнары, на сегодняшний день у нее есть: 3 коровы, 15 овец, лошадь. Ежемесячный совокупный доход Гульнары составляет около 18,000 сом (KGS). Гульнара обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 80,000 сом (KGS) для закупки скота. Гульнара намерена и дальше увеличивать поголовье скота и развивать ее бизнес.
texts.en:
Gulnara is 51 years old, married, and the mother of 2 sons. She has a post-secondary education and works at a preschool. As an additional source of income for her family, Gulnara has also raised animals for 15 years. Because of Gulnara's persistence, purposefulness, and hard work, today she has 3 cows, 15 sheep, and a horse. Gulnara's monthly combined income is around 18,000 som (KGS).

Gulnara has applied to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 80,000 som (KGS) to buy livestock. Gulnara intends to continue increasing her headcount of livestock and developing her business.

loans.use: to buy some livestock to increase the size of her herd.

loans.name: Perla

texts.es:
Perla es una persona muy emprendedora que esta luchando para poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida y la de sus seres queridos por medio de sus estudios. Es una persona muy sacrificada que lucha por sus metas, comenta que su anterior préstamo lo uso en poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, lo cual le fue de mucha ayuda.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar de vuelta las cuotas de su carrera y seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Perla is a very enterprising person who is working hard at her studies in order to improve her and her loved ones' living conditions. Perla is very dedicated and is working hard towards her goals. Perla says that she used her last loan to pay tuition fees, and this was a great help to her.

Perla is applying for this loan in order to pay tuition fees again and to continue with her studies.

loans.use: to pay tuition fees.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy an anaerobic digestor.

loans.name: Ignacio

texts.es:
El Sr. Ignacio es de la ciudad de Itá, tiene dos hijos quienes son su inspiración para poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida. Él es maestro y comenta que está estudiando la carrera de ingeniería en informática para poder mejorar su vida y la de su familia.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Ignacio is from Ita. He has two children who provide his inspiration for striving for a better life.

He is a teacher and at the moment is studying for a degree in computer engineering which he hopes will help to improve his life and that of his family.

He is asking for this loan to pay for his university fees so he can continue with his studies.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Maria Del Pilar

texts.es:
Maria del Pilarcon 26 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo e hijos en distrito de Cayaltí,provincia de Chiclayo, departamento Lambayeque, país Perú.Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

María del pilar se dedica a la actividad de venta de ropa y productos de belleza, desde hace más de 4 añosde antiguedad en el negocio, en su propio domicilio. Solicita préstamo para la compra de mercadería, compra de ropa para su negocio. De esta manera hacer crecer su negocio y poder mejorar su calidad de vida.

Ha tenido 3 préstamos en nuestra institución, el último fué de S/.3,000.00 y lo a pagado puntualmente.
texts.en:
Maria del Pilar, 26, lives with her husband and children in Cayalti in the Chiclayo province of Peru. This region belongs to the Lambayeque office. The residents of this area dedicate their time mostly to agriculture, livestock and commerce.

Maria del Pilar sells clothes and beauty products. She has been doing this for more than four years and runs her business from her home.

She is asking for a loan to buy goods in the form of clothes for her business. This will help her business to grow and she can improve her lifestyle.

She has already had three loans with our institution. The last one was for 3,000 soles and she paid it off on time.

loans.use: to buy clothes for her business.

loans.name: Freddys

texts.es:
Freddys está estudiando la carrera de administración de empresas, está culminando su tesis de maestría, tiene un negocio de ventas de celulares y Giros en su casa, su mama es comerciante.
Su meta a futuro es trabajar como encargado en ventas o gerente Comercial, y es por ello que está luchando y esforzándose.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en su gasto de titulación, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por esta oportunidad que recibe de ser alguien en la vida.
texts.en:
Freddys is studying business administration and is finishing his master's thesis. He owns a business selling cell phones and Giros in his house. His mother is a business-woman.

His goal for the future is to work in sales management or as a business manager, which is why he is pushing himself.

His is requesting this loan to be able to pay his tuition so that he can continue with his studies. He is grateful for the opportunity that he has been given to do something with his life.

loans.use: to pay tuition

loans.name: Mirna

texts.es:
Mirna tiene 23 años, está casada,  y comenta que es estudiante de enfermería, se desempeña como limpiadora doméstica, es una joven que quiere salir adelante y mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
Su sueño es graduarse con buenas calificaciones, encontrar un buen trabajo y así dar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
Pide este préstamo para poder cubrir el gasto de sus útiles de universidad, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Mirna, 23, is married and is studying to be a nurse. She also works as a housemaid.

She is a young girl who wants to get ahead in life and improve her standard of living.

Her dream is to graduate with good qualifications, find a good job and offer her family a better quality of life.

She is asking for this loan to be able to buy supplies for university so she can continue with her studies.

loans.use: to pay for university supplies.

loans.name: Heidi

texts.es:
Heidi es una joven estudiante, es de la ciudad de Santaní,  trabaja y estudia al mismo tiempo, es una persona trabajadora, honesta y  responsable es muy dedicada al estudio. Está estudiando la carrera de Ingeniera Zootecnia, y comenta que su meta es tener su título y poder aumentar sus ingresos, enseñar en las Universidades así ayudar a los jóvenes para ser alguien en la vida.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Heidi is a young student from Santani. She works and studies at the same time. She is hard-working, honest and responsible, as well as being fully committed to her studies.

She is studying a degree in zoo technology. Her goal is to obtain a qualification and be able to improve her income. She would like to teach at universities so she can help young people fulfil their potential in life.

She is asking for this loan to pay for her university fees so she can carry on with her studies.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a bio-digester.

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es:
Jorge continua con sus estudios en la carrera de odontología, comenta que le gusta mucho su carrera y se esta esforzando bastante para poder cumplir su sueño de ser un buen profesional que ayude a las demás personas. Su anterior préstamo lo invirtió en pagar las cuotas de su carrera, lo cual le fue muy útil y de mucha ayuda.
Hoy pide nuevamente este préstamo para poder pagar de vuelta las cuotas de su carrera, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo, y agradece por esta oportunidad de cumplir con sus metas.
texts.en:
Jorge continues with his education on a dentistry course. He says that he likes his course a lot and is working quite hard to be able to achieve his dream of becoming a professional who helps other people. His previous loan was invested in paying his course fees which was very useful and of great help.

Today, he is again requesting a loan to be able to pay back his course fees and thus be able to continue his education as he has been doing. He is thankful for this opportunity to achieve his goals.

loans.use: to pay his university fees.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay his university fees.

loans.name: Alejandro

texts.es:
Alejandro es de la ciudad de Curuguaty, soltero y vive con sus padres, estudia y trabaja al mismo tiempo. Es empleado de una Radio y está cursando el  primer año   de la carrera de Contaduría Publica. 
Es una persona muy sacrificada, ya que dice que es muy duro poder estudiar y trabajar al mismo tiempo.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Alejandro is from the city of Curuguaty. He is single and lives with his parents. He studies and works at the same time. He is an employee of a radio station and is in enrolled in his first year of a public accounting course.

He is a very self-sacrificing person since he says that it is hard to study and work at the same time.

He is requesting this loan to be able to pay his course fees and thus be able to continue his education as he has been doing.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: El señor Juan es casado y tiene un hijo de 16 años, el señor Juan comenta que con este sistema de biodigestor él pretende mejorar su calidad de vida tanto para él como para su familia, en lo referente a salud (por el humo del fogón de leña),y en lo económico (no comprar fertilizantes ni invertir en horas hombres para la recolección de leña), el señor Juan se dedica a la ganadería y el uso de este sistema le vendría muy bien, ya que le facilitaría la preparación de sus alimentos y para mejorar la calidad del pasto para el ganado. El señor Juan se sentiría muy agradecido que le brindaran el apoyo para adquirir el financiamiento para el Sistema Biodigestor.
texts.en: Juan is married and has a 16 year old son. Juan tells us that with this biodigester (waste water treatment system), he intends to improve his quality of life for himself and his family in terms of health (due to the smoke from woodfire) and economics (he won't have to buy fertilizers or invest in man hours to collect wood.) Juan is dedicated to cattle and the use of this system could do well since it would facilitate the preparation of his food and improve the quality of the grass for the cattle. Juan would feel very grateful if you provide support so he can acquire financing for the biodigester system.

loans.use: to buy a biodigester system.

loans.name: Sonia Margarita

texts.es:
Sonia, de 36 años de edad, está acompañada, se dedica a los oficios domésticos, estudio hasta noveno grado, sus hijos viven con ella, su compañero de vida se dedica a la agricultura y sus hijos estudian en la escuela de la comunidad.

Sonia, junto a su pareja trabaja en la agricultura como medio de subsistencia, toda la familia se involucra en esta actividad, siembran maíz y yuca en el terreno de la casa. 

Sonia, necesita el préstamo para dar mantenimiento al cultivo de yuca que ya tiene establecido y para cultivará 14,000 metros cuadrados de maíz.

Sonia, sueña con enseñarles a trabajar la tierra, porque también deben estudiar y ser profesionales, además desea ampliar su casa.
texts.en:
Sonia, 36, is married. She is dedicated to housework. She finished ninth grade. Her children live with her. Her spouse is dedicated to farming and her children study at the community school.

Sonia, along with her husband, works in agriculture as a means to support themselves. All of the family is involved in this work. They plant maize and yucca on their land.

Sonia needs the loan to maintain the yucca crop that she has already established and to cultivate 14,000 square meters of maize.

Sonia dreams of teaching (her children) to work the land because they also should study and become professionals. She also wishes to expand her house.

loans.use: to maintain the yucca crop that she has already established and to cultivate 14,000 square meters of maize.

loans.name: Maria Rosalina

texts.es:
María, de 32 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado, está acompañada, su pareja es agricultor, tienen dos hijos uno adolescentes y otro pequeño.

María, tiene experiencia en la elaboración de hamacas, pero también le apoya a su pareja en la preparación de la tierra y en la siembra de maíz y también su hijo les ayuda después que regresa de la escuela.

El préstamo lo solicita para comprar insumos para la siembra de granos básicos como: pesticidas, abono y otros de esa forma lograrán tener una buena cosecha y lograrán que su vida mejore considerablemente. 

El sueño de María, es construir su casa de adobe porque actualmente es de bahareque.
texts.en:
María is 32 years old. She went to school up to the sixth grade. She is married and her spouse is a farmer. They have two children, a teenager and a little one.

María has experience making hammocks, but she also helps her spouse to prepare the soil and plant the corn. Their son also helps them after he gets home from school.

She is asking for the loan to buy materials to plant basic grains, such as pesticide, fertilizer and more, in order to have a good harvest and improve her life considerably.

María's dream is to build and adobe house because the one she has now is made of wattle and daub.

loans.use: to buy materials to grow basic grains such as pesticides, fertilizer and more to have a good harvest.

loans.name: Marino

texts.es:
Marino con 39 años de edad, vive junto a sus hijos y esposa, en el distrito de Callayuc, provincia de Cutervo, departamento de Cajamarca, país Perú.Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

Marino se dedica a la agricultura, especialmente al cultivo de café, desde hace 8 años por lo que cuenta con experiencia en el negocio, su esposa le apoya cocinando para los trabajadores que dan mantenimiento a sus fincas. Solicita préstamo para la compra de abonos y inversión de mantenimiento de su finca, manteniendo a sus fincas obtendrá mayores rendimientos.

Socio recurrente de Edpyme Alternativa, a manejado seis créditos, los cuales los a cancelado de forma puntual.
texts.en:
Marino, 39 years old, lives with his children and wife in the district of Callayuc, Cutervo province, Cajamarca department, in the country of Peru. The people who live in this area work mostly in agriculture, raising animals, and in trade.

Marino works in agriculture, specifically in growing coffee for the past 8 years, so he has experience in the business. His wife supports him, cooking for the workers who maintain the crops. He asks for a loan to purchase manure and invest in the maintenance of the farm, by maintaining his farm he will get better results.

He is a repeat borrower with Edpyme Alternativa, and has had six loans, which were paid off punctually.

loans.use: to purchase manure and invest in maintaining the farm

loans.name: Candelario

texts.es:
Candelario con 35 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive junto a su cónyuge y sus 04 hijos, en el distrito de Cañaris, provincia de Ferreñafe, departamento de Lambayeque, país Perú. Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

Candelario se dedica a la agricultura, cuenta con cultivos de café, de variedad Catimor de 05 y 06 años de edad, cuenta con fincas fruteras de café en buen estado, dichos cultivos se encuentran ubicado a unos metros de su domicilio, además se dedica a la cría de ganado vacuno y cultivo de pan llevar, cuenta con más de 11 años de experiencia en la agricultura, cuenta con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales. El destino del crédito es para invertir en el negocio de abono,mantenimiento de su cultivo de café.Invirtiendo en su negocio y poder adquirir una utilidad aceptable para que mejore su calidad de vida.

Socio recurrente, este es su segundo crédito con nuestra entidad financiera Edpyme Alternativa, Socio exclusivo de Edpyme Alternativa.
texts.en:
Candelario is 35 years old. He is in a common law marriage. He lives with his spouse and their 4 children in the district of Cañaris, province of Ferreñafe, department of Lambayeque, in Peru. The residents of this locality mostly work in agriculture, ranching and in trade.

Candelario works in agriculture. He has coffee crops of the Catimor variety which are from 5 to 6 years old. His coffee farm is in good condition and are a few meters away from his house. He also raises cattle and grows staple crops. He has more than 11 years' experience in agriculture. He has very good personal and work references. The loan will be used to invest in the business by buying fertilizer and doing maintenance on his coffee crop, so that he can acquire an acceptable profit and improve his quality of life.

He is a returning borrower and this is his second loan with our financial entity, Edpyme Alternativa. He is exclusively a member of Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: to invest in the maintenance of his coffee crop.

loans.name: Nelly

texts.en:
Nelly, 45, is a married woman with three children, who are all currently in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Nelly has a hollow blocks making business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for seven years.

Nelly requested a PHP 20,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy sand, cement and other materials for her business.

 She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy materials like sand and cement for her business.

loans.name: Flordeliza

texts.en:
Flordeliza is 39 years old, married, and has three children, who are in school.

Flordeliza is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She has been raising pigs for three years now and has borrowed six times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Flordeliza requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to purchase feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

In the future, Flordeliza would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Rinalyn

texts.en:
Rinalyn, 35, is a married woman with three children, two of whom are currently in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Rinalyn has a fishing business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 10 years.

Rinalyn requested a PHP 20,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy fish net, bamboo and other materials for her business.

She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fish net, bamboo and other materials for her business.

loans.name: María Agustina

texts.es:
María, de 36 años de edad, estudio hasta segundo grado, es madre soltera, tiene cinco hijos, todos son menores de edad y el mayor trabaja medio tiempo, porque en la mañana estudia.

María, desde que tenia sus hijos pequeños y el padre de ellos la abandono, decidió aprender a elaborar hamacas y con el apoyo de su madre logró aprender bien, ahora que sus hijos crecieron le ayudan y siempre sigue trabajando en lo mismo.

María, necesita el préstamo para comprar hilo de cáñamo y para comprar insumos agrícolas para los cultivos de maíz, de esa manera lograra obtener una buena cosecha y podrá vender una parte y lo demás será destinado para el consumo familiar.

El sueño de María es construir su casa, porque donde vive es propiedad de un tío y tarde o temprano se van a tener que ir de esa casa.
texts.en:
María, 36 years old, went to school up to the second grade, is a single mother, has five children, all of whom are minors, and the oldest works part time because he goes to school in the mornings.

María, since she had her young children and their father left her, decided to learn to make hammocks and with her mother's support, she managed to learn it well. Now that her children have grown, they help her and she always continues working in the same field.

María needs the loan to purchase hemp thread and to purchase agricultural supplies for her corn crop. In this way, she will manage to get a good harvest and to be able to sell a part and the rest will be used for family consumption.

María's dream is to build a house because she where she lives is the property of an uncle and sooner or later they will need to leave this house.

loans.use: to purchase hemp thread and to purchase agricultural supplies for the corn crop.

loans.name: Nicolas Alfonso

texts.es:
Nicolas is a-33-year-married man who lives in the municipality of Betania. He has a little daughter who only is 6 years of age and is his main reason to work hard. He owns a store where he sells different kind of products and has become very recognized in his place.

Some time ago his family suffered the consequences of war so they had to move over from the original municipality. Si his store is just beginning so he has some money problems, and as he wants to make his business successful and that his sales increase he’s asking for a loan so he can buy some stands and to buy inputs for his store.

Nicolas doesn´t stop dreaming and he wishes with leaving a good and successful business to his children. You can help this man and his family to improve their lives with just a loan.
texts.en:
Nicolas is a-33-year-old married man who lives in the municipality of Betania. He has a little daughter who only is 6 years of age and is his main reason to work hard. He owns a store where he sells different kinds of products and has become well thought of in the area.

Some time ago his family suffered the consequences of war and so they had to move away from their original municipality. As his store is just starting up, he has some financial problems. As he wants to make his business successful and to increase his sales, he is asking for a loan so that he can buy some stands and invest in his store.

Nicolas does not stop dreaming and he wants to leave a good and successful business to his children. You can help this man and his family to improve their lives with just a loan.

loans.use: to buy some stands and invest in his store.

loans.name: Fermin

texts.es:
Fermin con 58 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive junto a su hijo en el distrito de Oyotún, provincia Chiclayo, departamento de Lambayeque, país Perú. Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

Fermin se dedica a brindar los servicios de jornalería-fumigación, contando con herramientas propias, como mochila de fumigar, bicicleta, palana, pico y oz; con más de 20 años de experiencia en el negocio. Su negocio esta ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Solicita préstamo para arreglos de vivienda y para mantenimiento de equipos y herramientas, dicha inversión le servirá para tener en mejores condiciones sus equipos y herramientas, con gran influencia en el negocio. Fermin piensa mejorar productividad de sus servicios y así poder atender las diversas necesidades de los clientes de la zona.

Fermin a cancelado de manera puntual. Desde que se convirtió en cliente de nosotros su negocio ha mejorado y su calidad de vida de igual forma.
texts.en:
Fermin, 58 years old and partnered, lives with his son in the district of Oyotún, Chiclayo province, Lambayeque department, in the country of Peru. The people in this area work mostly in agriculture, raising animals, and trade.

Fermin works offering his services as a day laborer/fumigator, having his own tools such as a backpack sprayer, a bicycle, a shovel, a pick, and ozone, with more than 20 years of experience in the business. His business is located in his house. He asks for the loan to repair the house and to maintain his equipment and tools. This investment will serve him to have his equipment and tools in better condition, with a great impact on the business.

Fermin plans to improve the productivity of his services and, so, be able to serve the diverse needs of the customers in the zone.

Fermin has made his payments punctually. Since he has become one of our clients, his business has improved and his quality of life has as well.

loans.use: to repair the house and to maintain his equipment and tools.

loans.name: Felipe

texts.es:
Felipe con 54 años de edad vive en casa propia de material rústico, vive con su cónyugue y su hijo en el distrito de Ferreñafe, provincia de Fereñafe, departamento de Lambayeque, país Perú,tiene muy buena referencias tanto personales como. Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

Felipe se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de cafeto, ubicado en el caserío de chilasque - cañaris, con una experiencia en el rubro de 30 años. El préstamo que se le otorgará lo utilizará en labores agrícolas, aplicaciones e incorporaciones de productos fito sanitarios, fertilizantes, y mano de obra para su cosecha. De esta manera lo ayudará a la mejora tanto fisiológica, morfológica y productiva de su cultivo, así como también tener una cosecha oportuna, y por ende tendrá mayor producción, una mejor calidad de producto, por lo cual no tendrá problemas en vender su producto.

Socio recurrente,la campaña pasada se le otorgó créditos de S/. 1000 y 1500 del cual a pagado bien. Firma solo.
texts.en:
Felipe is 54 years old. He lives in his own home made of rustic material. He lives with his spouse and son in the district of Ferreñafe, province of Fereñafe, department of Lambayeque, country of Peru. He has very good personal and work references. The residents of this locality mostly work in agriculture, trade and ranching.

Felipe works in agriculture, specifically, growing coffee plants in the hamlet of Chilasque - Cañaris. He has 30 years' experience in the field. The loan he will be given will be used in his farm work, to buy plant health product applications, fertilizer, and pay for labor for the harvest. This way, he will help improve his crop physiologically, morphologically and productively. He will also have a timely crop, and therefore a better yield, which in turn will mean he won't have problems selling his product.

He is a returning borrower. During the last campaign. he was given loans of S/. 1000 and 1500, which he paid off. Sole signature.

loans.use: to buy plant protection product applications, fertilizer and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Joselito

texts.es:
Joselito con 37 años de edad, vive en casa propia de material rustico, vive en el distrito de Pucará, provincia de Jaen, departamento de Cajamarca, país Perú. Joselito tiene 15 años radicando en la zona,cuenta con muy buenas referencias personales como laborales por parte de los habitantes de su comunidad.

Joselito se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de piña, con una experiencia en el rubro desde hace 5 años. El préstamo que se le otorgará lo utilizará en labores agrícolas, aplicaciones e incorporaciones de productos fito sanitarios, fertilizantes, y mano de obra para su cosecha. De esta manera lo ayudará a la mejora tanto fisiológica, morfológica y productiva de su cultivo, así como también tener una cosecha oportuna, y por ende tendrá mayor producción, una mejor calidad de producto, por lo cual no tendrá problemas en vender su producto.

Socio recurrente, el crédito pasado se le otorgó S/. 1000, 2000 de los cuáles pago bien. Firma solo.
texts.en:
37-year-old Joselito lives in his own home, which is made of rustic materials. He lives in Pucarà, in Jaen province in the Cajamarca department of Peru. He has been based in the area for 15 years, and is well thought of by the locals on account of his personality and work.
Joselito works in agriculture, growing pineapples in particular, and has 5 years' experience. He will use the loan to carry out agricultural work and buy and use phytosanitary products and fertiliser and will pay people to help with the harvest. This will enable him to improve his crop physiologically, morphologically and in terms of productivity. It will also allow him to have a good harvest and, consequently, will lead to better production and a higher quality product which he will have no difficulty in selling.
A previous loan beneficiary, he has received loans of S/. 1000 and S/. 2000, both of which he paid off in full. He signs alone.

loans.use: to carry out agricultural work, and to buy and use phytosanitary products

loans.name: Celestino

texts.es:
Celestino con 42 años de edad, vive junto a su cónyuge y su menor hijo,en el distrito de Pucará,provincia de Jaén, departamento de Cajamarca, país Perú. Los habitantes de esta localidad en su mayoría se dedican a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

Celestino se dedica al Comercio de animales caprinos.Hace 5 años.Solicita préstamo para invertir en negocio de comercio de animales caprinos, de esta manera incrementar sus ganancias. Posee conocimiento en el negocio.

Celestino es socio recurrente en Edpyme alternativa, ha manejado créditos los cuales los ha cancelado de forma puntual.
texts.en:
Celestino is 42-years old. He lives with his partner and younger son in the district of Pucará, province of Jaén in the department of Cajamarca in Peru. The inhabitants of this area mostly work in agriculture, business and livestock.

Celestino has worked in the goat business for 5 years. He is asking for a loan to invest in his business selling goats, in order to increase his earnings. He has knowledge in the business. Celestino is a recurrent member in Edpyme Alternativa and has managed loans which he has paid off on time.

loans.use: to invest in a business selling goats.

loans.name: Alfonso

texts.es:
Alfonso con 48 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive con su cónyuge y sus dos hijos, los cuáles estudian secundaria en el Colegio Nacional de la zona. Vive junto a su familia en el distrito de Cayaltí, provincia de Chiclayo, departamento de Lambayeque, país Perú.Los habitantes de esta localidad en su mayoría se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería.

Alfonso se dedica a prestar servicio de carpintero metálico, realizando trabajos como puertas, ventanas y otros de material galvanizado, desde hace más de 5 años.Solicita préstamo para la compra de animales y comidas para estos. El crédito a otorgarle le facilitará obtener ingresos adicionales.

Alfonso si cuenta con experiencia crediticia, es socio nuevo en nuestra institución financiera
texts.en:
Alfonso is 48-years old and in a common-law marriage. He lives with his partner and two children, who are in high school at the National High School in the area. He lives with his family in the district of Cayaltí, province of Chiclayo and department of Lambayeque in Peru. The people who live here mainly work in agriculture and livestock.

Alfonso has worked as a metallic carpenter, doing jobs such as making doors, windows and other steel materials, for more than 5 years. He is asking for a loan to buy animals and food for them. The loan given to him will help him to get additional income. Alfonso has experience with loans and is a new member with the financial institution.

loans.use: to buy animals and food for them.

loans.name: Analyn

texts.en:
Analyn is 35 years old and a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Analyn has a food vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for three years. 

Analyn requested a PHP 15,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase ingredients like noodles, spices, meat, vegetables, etc. for her business.

In the future, Analyn would like to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients like noodles, spices, meat, vegetables, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Flora

texts.en:
Flora is 68 years old, widowed and has six children. 

Flora is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She has been raising pigs for 12 years now, and has borrowed 21 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Flora requested a PHP 29,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

In the future, Flora would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

loans.name: Carmen Elena

texts.es:
Carmen, de 27 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato, es madre soltera, vive junto a sus padres quienes la han apoyado mucho siempre.

Carmen, tiene diez años de tener una granja de pollos de engorde, la granja era de su mamá pero desde hace muchos años lo administra y ahora su madre la apoya en su hogar.

El préstamo lo utilizara para arreglar la instalación de la granja y comprar concentrado y granza para los pollos, solo así podrá mejorar sus ingresos, porque los pollos van a estar en mejores condiciones y podrá venderlos a buen precio. 

El objetivo de Carmen, siempre ha sido obtener ingresos de la granja y seguir comprando más y con el tiempo ampliarla para comprar gallinas ponedoras y mejorar su estilo de vida.
texts.en:
Carmen, 27 years old, studied through secondary school, is a single mother, and lives with her parents who have always supported her a lot.

Carmen has had a farm of chickens she fattens for ten years. The farm was her mother's but for many years she has run it and now her mother helps her in her home.

The loan will be used to repair the farm building and purchase concentrated feed and rice husks for the chickens, only in this way will she be able to improve her income because the chickens will be in better condition and she will sell them at a good price.

Carmen's goal has always been to get income from the farm and continue purchasing more and with time to expand it to purchase laying hens and improve her lifestyle.

loans.use: to fix the farm building and purchase concentrated feed and rice husks for the chickens.

loans.name: Marivic

texts.en:
Marivic is 39 years old and married. She has two children who are both in school and she works very hard to provide for them.

Marivic runs a general store in the Philippines. She has been in this business for eight years and sells a variety of items such as rice, coffee, canned goods, soft drinks, beers, shampoo, etc. 

Marivic requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stocks like rice, coffee, canned goods, soft drinks, beers, shampoo, etc. to sell.

In the future, Marivic would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks like rice, coffee, canned goods, soft drinks, beers, shampoo, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Wilfredo

texts.es:
Wilfredo con 59 años de edad, vive en casa propia de material rústico, vive con su cónyugue y sus 3 hijos de 21,19,13 años de edad, en el distrito de Pucará, provincia de Jaén, departamento de Cajamarca, país Perú. Wilfredo tiene muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales en su comunidad.Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

Wilfredo se dedica a la venta de abarrotes, cuenta con 5 años de experiencia en esta actividad, negocio ubicado en su domicilio en en caserio de sondor. Solicita préstamo para la compra de abarrotes, además el se dedica al cultivo de café y granadilla, ingresos adicionales que le permiten solventar su canasta familiar,con ello le generara mayores ingresos y así poder mejorar su calidad de vida. Para este rubro no hay mayor competencia en la zona y con ello obtiene mejores precios.

Wilfredo socio recurrente. Firma sólo.
texts.en:
Wilfredo is 59-years old and lives in his own, rustic house with his partner and 3 children, ages 21, 19 and 13. He lives in the district of Pucará, province of Jaén and department of Cajamarca in Peru. He has very good personal and work references in his community. The people here work mainly in agriculture, livestock and business.

Wilfredo has worked selling grocery items and has 5 years of experience in this job. His business is located in his home, in the small village of Sondor. He is asking for a loan to buy grocery supplies. He also works growing coffee and passionfruit, which are additional incomes that allow him to resolve his family budget. With the loan, he will get a better income and be able to improve his quality of life. For this category of work, there is no better competition in the area so he will get better prices. He is a recurrent member.

loans.use: to buy grocery supplies.

loans.name: Veneranda

texts.en:
Fifty-nine-year-old Veneranda is a native of the town of Loon, Bohol. She has four children. Three of them are already grown while her youngest is 17 and still attending school.

She earns a living by engaging in tailoring services. She makes and adjusts dresses and provides other tailoring services.

She needs capital to finance her livelihood. She needs materials that would enable her to improve her income. With the availability of those resources, she could maximize and expand her source of income.

Veneranda is requesting a loan to buy cloth. 

She would like to expand her tailoring livelihood to become more productive.

loans.use: to buy cloth.

loans.name: Gilberto

texts.es:
Gilberto con 54 años de edad, vive en casa propia de material rústico junto a su esposa y sus 02 hijos, en el distrito de Aramango, provincia de Bagua, departamento Amazonas, país Perú, en una zona rural donde los habitantes se conocen y dan buenas referencias del señor Gilberto. Los habitantes de esta localidad en su mayoría se dedican a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

Gilberto se dedica al cultivo de café variedad Catimor .El préstamo lo utilizará para invertir en mantenimiento(compra de abonos y fertilizantes) para el cultivo de café. Esta inversión le permitirá ganancias para mejorar su condición económica y por ende invertir en mejores condiciones de vida.

Gilberto es socio nuevo en Edpyme Alternativa sus ganancias van dirigidas mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
54-year-old Gilberto lives in his own home which is made of rustic materials. He lives with his wife and 2 children in the district of Aramango in Bagua province which forms part of Peru's Amazonas department. This is a rural area where the locals all know one another and have good things to say of Gilberto. Most of the area's residents work in agriculture, trade or cattle rearing. Gilberto grows the Catimor variety of coffee. He will use the loan to invest in products (manure and fertiliser) to maintain his coffee crop. This will enable him to boost his income so he can improve his financial situation and, ultimately, have a better quality of life.
Gilberto is a new member of Edpyme Alternativa and his earnings are used to improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to invest in products (manure and fertiliser) for maintaining his coffee crop

loans.name: Janice

texts.en:
Janice is 29 years old and married. 

Janice has a general store in the Philippines. She has been in this business for three years and sells a variety of items such as canned good, spices and other groceries.  

Janice requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

In the future Janice would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Christina

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Christina works hard to support her family.

She has a vegetable vending business in the Philippines, and she also earns additional income from farming vegetables.  

Christina is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to buy more vegetables to sell for her vegetable vending business.

Christina has been sustaining her business activities through her past five loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Hugo

texts.es:
Hugo continua con sus estudios en obstetricia es un joven que quiere ser un buen profesional, es por ello que se esta esforzando y pone su mayor esfuerzo para poder ayudar a las demás personas en algo tan importante como es su salud. El comenta que su préstamo anterior lo uso en poder pagar las cuotas de su universidad, lo cual le fue muy útil.
Pide este nuevo préstamo para poder invertirlo nuevamente en las cuotas de su carrera, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en: Hugo continues with his studies in obstetrics. He is a young man who wants to be a good professional. For that reason, he is striving to put his best effort into being able to help other people with something as important as their health. He says that his previous loan was used to be able to pay his college fees, which was very useful for him. He is asking for a new loan to be able to invest it again in his degree fees. This way he can keep going with his studies like he has been doing.

loans.use: to pay for college fees.

loans.name: Jorge Luis

texts.es:
Jorge Luis con 18 años de edad, soltero, sin hijos, vive con su familia, en el distrito de Oyotún,provincia Chiclayo, departamento de Lambayeque, país Perú, en una zona rural. Los habitantes de esta localidad en su mayoría se dedican a ala agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

Jorge Luis se dedica a brindar los servicios de jornalería-fumigación, contando con herramientas propias, como mochila de fumigar, bicicleta, palana, pico y oz; con más de 3 años de experiencia en el negocio.Negocio está ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Solicita préstamo para arreglos de vivienda y para mantenimiento de equipos y herramientas, dicha inversión le servirá para tener en mejores condiciones sus equipos y herramientas, con gran influencia en el negocio; EL piensa mejorar productividad de sus servicios y así poder atender las diversas necesidades de los clientes de la zona.

Socio nuevo en Edpyme Alternativa.
texts.en:
Jorge Luis is 18 years old. He is single and has no children. He lives with his family in the district of Oyotún, which is in Chiclayo province in the department of Lambayeque, a rural area of Peru.

Jorge Luis works as a labourer providing fumigation services. He uses his own tools such as a backpack sprayer, a bike, a shovel, a pick and a scythe. He has over three years of experience in this business which he runs from home. He is asking for a loan to carry out repairs on his home and to maintain his equipment and tools. This investment would improve the condition of his equipment and tools which would have a significant effect on his business. He is looking to improve the productivity of his services and therefore be able to attend to the diverse requirements of his clients in the area.

A new member of Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: to carry out repairs on his home and to maintain his equipment and tools.

loans.name: Sandra

texts.en:
Sandra is 41 years old and single with three children. She is in the agricultural business, farming vegetable in the Philippines. Sandra is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy fertilizers, vegetable seeds and other farm supplies.

Sandra has been in this business for 5 years and also earns additional income from her general store.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, vegetable seeds and other farm supplies

loans.name: Rochelle

texts.en:
Rochelle is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a buy and sell dry goods business in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to purchase more stocks of dry goods like slippers, bags, etc. to sell to her customers for her buy and sell dry goods business.

Rochelle has been in this business for 1 year. Rochelle earns more income from chorizo making.

Rochelle has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of dry goods like slippers, bags, etc. to sell to her customers

loans.name: Judith

texts.en:
Hello lenders! Meet Judith, 37, a vibrant, energetic, hard-working and focused farmer. She hails from the Kitale area which is one of the most backward, rural towns in Kenya. The condition of the village in the town speaks for itself as basic requirements such as clean water and electricity are missing. However, despite these challenges, Judith loves farming. Judith practices mixed farming, and through that she has been able to take care of her aging parents.

Not everything has been good for this humble and hard-working mum. The Kitale area has a ready market for poultry products and eggs, and Judith, being an enterprising person, would want to take advantage of that and make profits. That is why she is kindly seeking a loan to start poultry farming. Judith has got enough space on her farm and wants to make use of the space through poultry farming. Other than income from selling eggs and poultry products, poultry will also provide manure to use in her farm, hence the money that could have been used in buying it will be saved. Judith projects that after a few months she will have more income to buy more poultry and also pay back the loan.

Judith has many dreams, but paying for her 7 children's education is her biggest one, because she hopes they can be professionals and make a great life for themselves. A little help can do a lot for Judith and her family. Loan now and watch her succeed.

loans.use: To buy poultry to expand her farming activities

loans.name: Carmen Esther

texts.es:
EL Grupo De Crédito Calle América se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía, que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.
En este lugar vive la señora Carmen, tiene 67 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen 2 hijos mayores de  edad y aun viven en su casa. Su esposo es artesano.
Doña Carmen es una mujer que toda la vida le ha gustado de alguna u otra forma ayudar a su marido, ella realiza el crédito para el negocio que tienen  junto a su querido esposo, el elabora barriles hechos en madera, de varios tamaños de acuerdo al gusto de sus clientes que compran estos artículos para el uso que ellos deseen darles,  mientas el elabora estos productos en su taller ella se encarga de vender en un local que tienen ahí mismo en las afueras del taller en su casa, a pesar de que este tipo de productos no es muy común en estos tiempos sus ventas son muy buenas, ya son mas de 50 años que llevan con esta actividad la cual viene de generaciones anteriores.
Este crédito es para comprar madera, pinturas y otros materiales  para elaborar los barriles. Lleva 10 años  en el grupo de crédito y le gusta por la ayuda que le dan con los créditos. Sus sueños son tener buena salud.
texts.en:
The credit group Calle América meets every 15 days in Montecristi Canton. This region is known for it's rich pre-colonial culture and handicrafts, which are renowned locally and internationally. This is the place where the famous Panama hat comes from.

Carmen lives in this region. She is 67 years old, married with two grown up children who still live in her home. Her husband is an artisan.

Doña Carmen is a woman who has always liked to help her husband in one way or another. In this case she is seeking a loan for the business that her and her dear husband have together. Her husband makes wooden barrels of varying sizes depending on the customer's needs.

Her husband is responsible for production and Carmen is responsible for selling, from a shop they have attached to the workshop and their home. Although these types of products are no longer common, they continue to have good sales. This business has now been going for over 50 years, and has been passed down through many generations.

This loan will be used to buy wood, paint and other materials, to produce the barrels. Carmen has been part of this credit group for 10 years and she really appreciates the support that is given along with the loans. Carmen's hope is to continue a life of good health.

loans.use: to buy wood, paint and other materials, to produce barrels.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is a widowed woman with six children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur who is 58 years old and has two children are still in school.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy fish net, gasoline for her boat, and other materials for her business.

Erlinda has been in this business for 20 years. She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fish net, gasoline for her boat, and other materials for her business.

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria is 52 years old and married with three children. With one child in school, Maria works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 9,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like snack foods, eggs, canned goods, home care products, and other groceries.

Maria has been in this business for eight years and sells a variety of items. In the future, she would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like snack foods, eggs, canned goods, home care products, and other groceries.

loans.name: Maricia

texts.fr: Maricia a 58 ans. Elle a un enfant. Elle vend des produits de première nécessité chez elle, à son domicile. Maricia s'informe régulièrement sur les besoins réels de ses clients. Elle demande un microcrédit pour diversifier ses produits et attirer plus de clients. A l’avenir, elle espère développer son activité et subvenir aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en: Maricia is 58 years old.  She has one child.  She sells essential staple products from her home.  Marcia keeps herself regularly informed on the real needs of her clients.  She requests a microcredit loan in order to diversify her products and attract more clients.  In the future, she hopes to develop her activity further and fulfill the needs of her family.

loans.use: to add cosmetic products to her business

loans.name: Chinlor's Group

texts.en:
Originally from Kratie province, Chinlor is 47 years old and she has four children, three of whom are depending on her to look after them.

Growing cassava is the primary source of her income. Moreover, she works for others for a fee to get additional income. She has been involved in her job for eight years. This year, she can earn less income than before because the crop is not healthy enough to produce good outputs.

After successfully repaying one previous loan which enabled her to have household supplies to support her family’s living better, she will take a new loan with VisionFund. As a group leader of three, she will use her portion of loan to buy pesticide and pay for labor fees to increase the productivity of root crops.

She hopes that this second loan will help her to earn more income to make her standard of living better than it was last year.

loans.use: to buy pesticide to protect her root crop from being destroyed by insects and thus increase its productivity.

loans.name: Ricardo

texts.en:
Ricardo has been a fisherman for almost ten years now. His main source of income is fishing. He sells fresh fish to the locals in his place.

He is a 45-year-old married man with two children. His eldest child is 19 while the youngest is 14 years old. He resides in the town of Loon, Bohol.

He would like to improve and augment his yield. With these, he could continue to support his family. Thus, slowly he could settle his obligations and handle his livelihood very well.

He is asking for a loan in the amount of 6,000 PHP to buy a new engine for the motor boat.

He is willing to work hard for the welfare of his family and also to support his children's respective studies for a brighter future.

loans.use: to buy a new engine for the motor boat.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a laptop computer and printer for her accounting business.

loans.name: Emely

texts.en:
Emely is a married woman with ten children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur who is 60 years old and has two children are currently in school.

She has a rice retailing business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy more sacks of rice to sell.

Emely has been in this business for 10 years. She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Graciela

texts.es:
Graciela continua con sus estudios de contabilidad, es una persona que se esfuerza por poder ser alguien en la vida, y también para poder ayudar a sus seres queridos por medio de su carrera. Comenta que por medio de su préstamo anterior pudo pagar las cuotas de sus estudios.
Hoy pide nuevamente este préstamo para poder invertirlo de vuelta en las cuotas de su carrera, y con ello poder seguir con sus estudios. Agradece por esta nueva oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir estudiando.
texts.en:
Graciela is continuing her studies in Accounting. She is a person who strives to make something out of her life. Graciela also wants to help her loved ones by utilizing her degree. She says that with her previous loan, she was able to pay the installments for her studies.

Today she is requesting another loan so that she can invest in the installments for her degree, which would allow her to continue her studies. Graciela appreciates this new opportunity she has received so that she can continue studying.

loans.use: to pay her university fees.

loans.name: Ángela Yisela

texts.es:
EL Grupo De Crédito Calle América se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía, que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.
En este lugar vive la señora Ángela, tiene  36 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre y de esta relación tiene cuatro hijos de 19, 16, 14 y 11  años de edad, los tres menores estudian en colegio y escuela. Su esposo se dedica a la venta de pescado.
Doña Ángela es una mujer que le gusta valerse por sí misma y así generar sus propios recursos que le ayuden a salir adelante, ella tiene un deposito  de venta de agua en  bidones, botellas, jugos, colas, entre otras bebidas, también  entregan a domicilio para esto le ayudan sus hijos, aunque la mayor parte la vende en su casa, ella también le da parte del crédito a su marido el cual se dedica a la venta de pescado, de esta forma ellos logran salir adelante trabajando honradamente, ella ya lleva más de 8 Años y espera seguir en su negocio muchos años más. 
Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar bidones de agua, colas, jugos, otras bebidas y pescado. Lleva 3 ciclos en el  Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos son rápidos. Sus sueños son seguir mejorando su vida y su negocio.
texts.en:
The loan group Calle América (America Street) meets every fifteen days in Canton Montecristi. It is known nationally and internationally for its rich pre-colonial culture and craftsmanship of famous straw hats.

Angela lives in this place and is 36 years old. She maintains a common-law marriage and has four children at ages 19, 16, 14 and 11. Three of the younger children study in school. Her husband sells fish.

Angela is independent and generates her own resources to succeed. She has a deposit selling water in cans, bottles, juices, sodas among other beverages. She also home delivers to help her children but most of the sales are from home. She also gives part of the loan to her husband so that they conduct honestly business selling fish. She has been in this business for more than 8 years and hopes to continue for many more years.

She will use this loan to buy water in cans, sodas, juices, other beverages and fish. This would be her third loan in the credit group. She likes it because the loans are fast. Her dreams are to continue improve her life and the business.

loans.use: to buy water in cans, sodas, juices, other beverages and fish.

loans.name: Elsie

texts.en:
Elsie is 66 years old, married, and has four children.

She is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines, and requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pig.

Elsie has been in this business for seven years now, and has borrowed five times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pig

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
Imelda, 49 years old, is a married woman with four children, two of whom are in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food vending business such as meat, oil, vegetables, etc.

Imelda has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food vending business such as meat, oil, vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Jennelyn

texts.en:
As a parent of two children, Jennelyn works hard to support her family.

She has a peanut butter making business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from buy-and-sell frozen foods. Jennelyn is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to buy ingredients for her such as sugar, oil, etc. for her peanut butter making and vending business.

Jennelyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past four loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food vending business such as sugar, oil, etc.

loans.name: Geraldine

texts.en:
Geraldine is 30 years old and married with two children. She is in agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines.

Geraldine is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy feed, vitamins, vaccine and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Geraldine has been in this business for six years and also earns additional income from rice retailing.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, vaccine and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Marife

texts.en:
Marife is a married woman with one child. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Marife is 46 years old now.

Marife has a buy-and-sell frozen foods business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 5,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more frozen foods to sell.

Marife has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more frozen foods to sell

loans.name: Hedeliza

texts.en:
Hedeliza is 55 years old and married with five children. She is in agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines.

Hedeliza is borrowing PHP 21,000 through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Hedeliza has been in this business for five years and also earns additional income from farming rice.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Jasmin

texts.en:
Jasmin is 36 years old and single.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock of groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, drinks, coffee, sugar, bread, eggs, snack foods and other personal care products .

Jasmin has been in this business for five years.

In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, drinks, coffee, sugar, bread, eggs, snack foods and other personal care products.

loans.name: Hằng

texts.en:
Mrs Hằng is 28 years old and she is married. She has had a retail business selling metals for more than five years.

Hằng lives in Quang Xuong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. Her family is a low-income household in village, moreover the market need is low in this region.

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, bricks and equipment to build a new toilet.

This is Hằng first loan with Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution. She hopes that this loan could make her little dream come true.

In the future, Hằng hopes for her business to do well, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her children to go to school and study well.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, bricks and equipment to build a new toilet.

loans.name: Helen

texts.en:
Helen is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with two children.

She has a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase additional groceries to sell.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Helen dreams that one day, she will be able to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries to sell.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is 58 years old and married with six children. She works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stocks of groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, drinks, coffee, sugar, bread, eggs, snack food, and personal care products .

Elizabeth has been in this business for 15 years.

In the future she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, drinks, coffee, sugar, bread, eggs, snack food, and personal care products.

loans.name: Chie Chie

texts.en:
Chie Chie is 26 years old and married with two children. With one child currently in school, she works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 9,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stocks to sell in her general store.

Chie Chie has been in this business for two years and sells a variety of items such as soft drinks, beer, detergent soap, canned goods, coffee, etc.

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more stocks to sell in her general store

loans.name: Editha

texts.en:
Editha is 46 years old and married with three children. With three children in school, she works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, snack foods, home care products, and other groceries.

Editha has been in this business for six years and sells a variety of items.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

In the future, Editha would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, snack foods, home care products, and other groceries.

loans.name: Joy

texts.en:
Joy is a married woman, 28 years old, with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Joy has a rice retailing business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 12,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of rice to sell to her customers.

Joy has been in this business for five years. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of rice to sell to her customers

loans.name: Lucia

texts.en:
Lucia is a widowed woman with five children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur who is 51 years old now.

She has a tailoring business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 13,500 loan through NWTF to buy materials for her business such as needles, thread, garments, etc.

Lucia has been in this business for five years. In the future, she would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy materials for her business such as needles, thread, garments, etc.

loans.name: Mehelle

texts.en:
Mehelle is 34 years old and married with six children. With four children in school, Mehelle works very hard to provide for them.

Mehelle runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 5,500 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like beverages, junk food, home care products and other groceries.

Mehelle has been in this business for five years and sells a variety of items.

In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like beverages, junk foods, home care products and other groceries.

loans.name: Mary Ann

texts.en:
Mary Ann is 39 years old; she is married, with two children. One is in school.

Mary Ann works hard to provide for her family. She has a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase additional groceries to sell.

Mary Ann has borrowed and paid seven loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 25 years and also earns an income from a bicycle taxi.

Mary Ann aspires to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a canopy for her sales stand and a large quantity of secondhand clothing.

loans.name: Rosalinda

texts.en:
Rosalinda is a woman and 51 years old now. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food vending business such as meat, vegetables, spices, etc.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

Rosalinda has been in this business for 31 years. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food vending business such as meat, vegetables, spices, etc.

loans.name: Thelma

texts.en:
Thelma is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Thelma is 40 years old and has one child in school.

Thelma has a buy-and-sell fish business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 13,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy a variety of fish to sell.

Thelma has been in this business for five years. In the future, she would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy a variety of fish to sell.

loans.name: Edna

texts.en:
Edna is 47 years old, single, and has one child who is still in school.

Edna is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines, and requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds, vitamins, vaccine, and other supplies to raise her pigs.

She has been in this business for five years now, and has borrowed five times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins, vaccine, and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Riza

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Riza works hard to support her family.

She has a general store business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from pig fattening. Riza is borrowing PHP 18,000 through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Riza has been sustaining her business activities through her past 24 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Tanciana

texts.en:
Tanciana is 65 years old and married with ten children. With one child in school, Tanciana works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 7,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like eggs, spices, snack foods, home care products, and other groceries.

Tanciana has been in this business for five years and sells a variety of items such as rice, sugar, soap, and other groceries.

In the future, she would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like eggs, spices, snack foods, home care products, and other groceries.

loans.name: Eleneva

texts.en:
Eleneva is a married woman with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur who is 52 years old and has two children are still in school.

She has a rice retailing business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional sacks of rice to sell.

Eleneva has been in this business for 15 years. She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Judy

texts.en:
Judy is 30 years old and has two children. She is married and has one child still in school.

Judy is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pig.

Judy has been in this business for three years now, and has borrowed two times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, she would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pig.

loans.name: Zenaida

texts.en:
Zenaida is a married woman with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Zenaida is 48 years old, and two of her children are in school.

Zenaida has a buying and selling of fish business in the Philippines. Zenaida requested a PHP 14,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more fish to sell.

Zenaida has been in this business for three years. In the future, Zenaida would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en:
Lydia is a married woman with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Lydia is 34 years old, and three of her children are currently in school.

Lydia has a rice retailing business in the Philippines. Lydia requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more sacks of rice to sell.

Lydia has been in this business for four years. She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more sacks of rice to sell.

loans.name: Jovie

texts.en:
Jovie is 25 years old and has two children. She is married, and one of her children is in school.

Jovie is in the agricultural business farming vegetables in the Philippines. She requested a 6000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Jovie has been in this business for 3 years now, and has borrowed 3 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her business.

In the future, Jovie would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Ma. Lea

texts.en:
Ma. Lea, 45, is a married woman with five children, three of whom are still in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Ma. Lea has a fishing business in the Philippines. Ma. Lea requested a 15000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy fishing nets, bamboo, and gasoline for her boat and other materials for her business.

Ma. Lea has been in this business for 15 years. She would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets, bamboo, and gasoline for her boat and other materials for her business.

loans.name: Maribel

texts.en:
Maribel, 39, is a married woman with five children who are presently in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Maribel has a rice retailing business in the Philippines. Maribel requested a 12000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more sacks of rice to sell.

Maribel has been in this business for 10 years. She would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Cindy María

texts.es:
EL Grupo De Crédito Calle América se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía, que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.
En este lugar vive la señora Cindy, tiene 20  años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre  y de esta relación tienen una hija de 3 meses de edad. Su esposo es chofer.
Doña Cindy es una mujer que le gusta de alguna forma colaborar con los gastos que genera el hogar, ella para obtener sus recursos desde hace mas de 4 años se dedica al comercio, vende ropa, zapatos y otros artículos por catalogo, su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta y también vende en su  casa hasta donde llegan sus clientes más conocidos, ella  deja a crédito y cobra cada quince días, de esta forma ella logra obtener sus propios recursos que le ayudan a salir adelante.
Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más mercadería como: ropa, zapatos  y todo de lo que ella vende. Lleva más de 2 años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por los servicios que les ofrece la institución. Sus sueños es darle lo mejor a su pequeña.
texts.en:
The loan group Calle América (America Street) meets every fifteen days in Canton Montecristi. It is known nationally and internationally for its rich pre-colonial culture and craftsmanship of famous straw hats.

Cindy lives in this place and is 20 years old. She maintains a common-law marriage and has a daughter of 3 months old. Her husband is a driver.

Cindy likes to support the household expenses in some way. In order to obtain the resources, she has been selling clothes, shoes and other items through catalogs for over 4 years. She sells door to door and at home for more long-time customers. She pays off her credit every fifteen days in order to obtain her own resources. This helps her succeed.

She will use this loan to buy more merchandise such as clothing, shoes and all of what she sells. It’s been more than two years in the credit group. She likes the services offered by the institution. Her dream is to give the best to her little one.

loans.use: to buy clothing, shoes etc.

loans.name: Cirilo

texts.en:
Cirilo is a 45-year-old, married man with two grown children. He hails from the town of Maribojoc, Bohol. He runs a sari-sari (variety) store. He sells commodities ranging from pouch vinegar, edible oil, eggs, noodles, powdered soap, biscuits and candies to seasonings, sugar and insect repellent.

Aside from running a store, he also engages in basket weaving. He has been engaged in that kind of livelihood for 10 years now.

He would like to take the loan to buy supplies for the store like condiments, beverages and assorted canned goods, and to purchase nito (palm) for basket weaving. These will continue to let Cirilo improve his earnings and slowly manage his finances.

Cirilo is very active in handling both sources of his income to become more productive.

loans.use: to buy supplies for the store like condiments, beverages and assorted canned goods, and to purchase nito (palm) for basket weaving.

loans.name: Ma. Cristina

texts.en:
Ma.Cristina is a hardworking woman entrepreneur.

She has a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase additional groceries to sell.

She industriously earns additional income through other business ventures like rice retailing.

Ma.Cristina dreams that one day, she will be able to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries to sell.

loans.name: Delicia

texts.en:
Delicia is 63 years old and married with four children.

She is in the agricultural business, farming vegetables in the Philippines, and is borrowing PHP 16,000 through NWTF to buy sacks of fertilizers, vegetable seeds, and other farm supplies.

Delicia has been in this business for four years and also earns additional income from pig fattening.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy sacks of fertilizers, vegetable seeds, and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Faustina

texts.en:
Faustina is 50 years old and married with four children. With one child still in school, Faustina works very hard to provide for them.
